page.description: Specify the date format in which dates will be returned when the user makes a selection from the Date Picker.

section.description: If you specify <Default>, the format is controlled by the 'Date format' property in the 'Other' section on the Dialog Properties tab page. The <Default> setting allows you to easily configure the component to use US formats for users in the U.S.A. and 'day/month/year' formats for users outside the US.
